subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch won his fourth Nascar Sprint Cup race of the year, outlasting Jimmie Johnson in a green-white-checkered finish at Michigan International Speedway on Sunday.
snippet: Kyle Busch won his fourth Nascar Sprint Cup race of the year, outlasting Jimmie Johnson in a green-white-checkered finish at Michigan International Speedway on Sunday.
